summary: A troubled young woman who visits a psychotherapist to help her quit smoking undergoes hypnosis and finds herself reliving a tragic Victorian romance from a past life.

keywords: lincoln center for the performing arts|doctor|flowers|past|love
title: Vuelve a mi lado
